title: Applying Regularization Techniques with SGD
description: In this lab, we will learn about the SGDClassifier and SGDRegressor in scikit-learn and how to use them to apply L1, L2, and elastic-net penalties on data.

meta.title: Scikit-learn | SGDClassifier & SGDRegressor | Penalty Techniques
meta.description: Learn how to use SGDClassifier and SGDRegressor in Scikit-learn to apply L1, L2, and elastic-net penalties on data.
meta.keywords: scikit-learn, SGDClassifier, SGDRegressor, L1 penalty, L2 penalty, elastic-net, machine learning, data analysis

meta.description: Изучите, как использовать SGDClassifier и SGDRegressor в Scikit-learn для применения L1-, L2- и эластичного сетевого штрафов к данным.
